I'll probably end up in a psychiatric hospital for the rest of my life, but at least I'll be safe and no longer a danger to myself or others. #mentalhealthawareness #seekinghelp #SAS"

In this transferred post, the attributional style has been changed from Global (GAS) to Specific (SAS). The original post attributed the individual's mental health struggles to their inability to function in society and their perceived danger to themselves and others. In contrast, the transferred post attributes the individual's decision to seek help to specific factors, such as their desire to be safe and their recognition that they are not capable of functioning in society. This change in attributional style allows the individual to maintain a sense of agency and control over their situation, rather than feeling overwhelmed by global factors beyond their control.
